Next Big Sound, NYC

Next Big Sound is hiring engineering talent as well as a Director of Client Services and Music Data Journalist. Check out the jobs page here: http://nextbigsound.com/jobs

NBS builds analytics tools for the music industry by marrying social media data with traditional music industry data such as record sales, radio play, and digital sales. Raised a Series A in the beginning of the year and are looking for talented people to build out our team.
